title: Requires the furnishing of a copy of a child's birth certificate at the time of enrollment of such child into a child day care center
summary: Enacts "Trenton's law"; requires that a parent or legal guardian furnish a copy of a child's birth certificate at the time of enrollment of such child into a child day care center; provides that if a copy is not supplied for review, the director or operator shall contact the statewide central register for missing and exploited children.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring the furnishing of a copy of a birth certificate at the time of enrollment of a child into a child day care center
